EmailTemplate.name: 05-26-22 DBNK Accelerate Magazine V2 Issue 2 Email 1.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: New Issue of NCR’s Accelerate Digital Magazine (Spring 2022)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: It’s here—the new issue of NCR’s Accelerate <[[https://www.ncr.com/banking/digital-banking/accelerate-magazine-v2-issue2?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Other&utm_campaign=2022_May_AccelerateMagV2-Issue2_DigitalBanking&utm_content=Email1&utm_industry=banking&utm_sub-industry=Digital_Banking]]> digital magazine! Stay in the know on the latest trends, technology and industry insights. What’s inside this issue of Accelerate: • The rapidly changing landscape for consumer engagement and what lies ahead • How banks and credit unions can unlock the power of customer data • The high-tech, high-touch engagement strategy that earned Celent’s top honor • How order-ahead experiences are translating to banking • Navigating the world of digital assets and cryptocurrency And much more! <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
